metadata.name: The Masked Disguise
metadata.description:
The perfume was first created to mask the stench of foul and offensive odors.
Spices and bold flavorings were created to mask the taste of putrid and rotting meat.
Here's me who wears a gold cloth upon me to hide the disguise that this world gave me.
Hiding my disguise is the only way I can escape from this cruel cold world.
